name: Private Chateau in the Loire Valley
description:
DESCRIPTION
A private Château which is completely yours to enjoy for your wedding.
The Château sleeps up to 20 people (max 16 adults) and offers the opportunity to celebrate and stay in secluded luxury with fabulous grounds and a private outdoor pool to discover. Additional bedroom can be added on request.
Plenty of local accommodation ranging from budget hotels through to luxury options so your guests will have lots of options.
The Château boasts 30 acres of private park and woodland, which is a beautiful backdrop for your celebrations.
The venue is also the perfect spot for you and your friends and family to stay whilst exploring the local vineyards, chateaux and fabulous restaurants - turn your wedding day into an unforgettable holiday at the Château!
Ground Floor
Grand Living room and library that can be urned into a ball room for small but luxurious venue ( 80sqm)
Petit salon ( 50sqm)
Dining area with large table and seating in the castle and by the pool as well
French billard
Kids area
Grand Entrance hallway with original sweeping staircase
First Floor
3 x bedrooms with queen-size beds and lovely park views. Both with Ensuite bathrooms with bath and hand-held shower
Bedroom meant for children with twin beds and ensuite shower and sink and close to the separate loo (opposite one of the above double bedrooms if parents want to be near the children)
Second Floor
Bedroom with king-size bed and huge, luxurious ensuite bathroom with bath and separate shower and chandelier
Bedroom with king-size bed and separate lounge area. Ensuite bathroom with bath and separate shower
Bedroom with queen-size bed and lovely park views. Ensuite bathroom with bath and separate shower
Third Floor
Bedroom with twin beds and ensuite bathroom with bath and hand-held shower
Pool house
Bedroom with queen-size bed and vew on the pool area and private garden. Ensuite bathroom with bath.
Outside Grounds
Private heated swimming pool (20m) with hard security cover for evenings/overnight. Heated up to 28C. Open May to end of September
Relaxing bed and sofas in the pool area
Large outdoor dining area
Pool house loo and fully equipped pool kitchen (including dishwasher)
BBQ
Brasero and plancha on request
30 acres of parkland and woods
Facilities
Private projection room
Free Wi-Fi in the clastle
TV with Netflix and Amazon prime included
Table tennis
Table Football...
Weekly Rates from € 6,000
One week rental is between Saturday 4pm - Saturday 10am.
If you require more information then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Pet friendly
Maid service
Swimming pool
Hotel recommendation list
Garden games
Recommended suppliers list available
Recommended wedding planner
Recommended caterer
Nearest Airport
Breakfast included
